email.subject: Call for Papers-21st International Conference on Information Systems Security (ICISS 2025)

invitation.conference_name: 21st International Conference on Information Systems Security (ICISS 2025)
invitation.host: Indian Institute of Technology Indore (IIT Indore)

body.description: ICISS is a premier international forum that brings together researchers, academicians, and industry professionals to share their latest findings and insights in the fields of cybersecurity, cryptography, system security, and hardware security.

history.significance: ICISS has played a critical role in shaping the research landscape and fostering meaningful collaborations in information systems security.

venue.name: IIT Indore
venue.reputation: excellence in education, research, and innovation

body.closing: We look forward to your contributions and participation in ICISS 2025!

contribution_info.message: To contribute to SEWORLD, send your submission to

more_info.description: provides more information on SEWORLD as well as links to a complete archive of messages posted to the list.
